title: Mister Hunting (1947) directed by Willy Rozier | French comedy

sources.title: Mister Hunting (1947) directed by Willy Rozier | French comedy
sources.description:
A wise bourgeois woman is the wife of a gentleman who loves hunting. The husband's friend, who is courting his wife, shows him that instead of going hunting, his partner is going to join a lady. Mad with rage, the sweet wife drags the man who enlightened her to a hotel which serves as a meeting place for the offending husband. The requested police commissioner is having a hard time resolving the imbroglio!

Original title: Monsieur Chasse (1947)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/MDBncPz2v7g


Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Georges Feydeau, Willy Rozier
With: Frederic Duvalles, Noelle Norman, Paul Meurisse, FÃ©lix Oudart
Genre: Colorized, French cinema, Comedy
